title: AP Scaling TANK
body:
I was thinking a few weeks ago when I was playing Shen how there are quite a few tanks that have damage based on how much armour they have, but I cant think of a champion that scales from Magic resist, and I was thinking Shen would be cool to be the first to scale off MR. Also then, there would be a champion that is suited versing a team of all ap. 
Thats about as far as I got with the thought, so I wanted to put it out there and see if other people thought it was a good idea or not.

replies.body: If you have 4 AP and 1 ADC and enemy has a Galio, the game is LITERALLY relying on the ADC to do well. If not, Galio can 1v4.

> [{quoted}](name=Best Viktor AU,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=Ljo2eNxs,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-05-17T12:06:17.128+0000)
>
> If you have 4 AP and 1 ADC and enemy has a Galio, the game is LITERALLY relying on the ADC to do well. If not, Galio can 1v4.

Their ADC just comes in to heal Galio with basic attacks haha.

I don't know why this has so much down votes, he has obviously heard of Galio but it's just he might not be the best for the team when maybe they're all poke and even with flash, Righteous Glory, Ascension and his E can't get close to even get a 2 man taunt ult off. 

A champion or an ability wouldn't be nice, an item could do this better but there are already so many choices. SV and Banshees, Void Gate or GA. QSS and Hexdrinker. These may seem like a small amount of choices but building 2 of these plus Mercury Treads already makes the enemy team do such a low amount of damage to you expecting you to have a fair amount of health and they aren't a 20 / 0 LB with full build and 20 stacks of Mejais. Right now is the tank meta and its only going to get harder to anything, adding a tank MR scaler will just ruin the double AP or triple magic damage with Corki or Kog bot lane and be to easy to counter with a single pick or item.
